title: Morning Yoga in the Park
description:
Start your day with mindfulness and gentle movement in the beautiful surroundings of Central Park. This beginner-friendly yoga session focuses on breathing techniques, basic poses, and meditation to help you find inner peace and physical wellness.

Our certified instructor will guide you through a series of gentle flows suitable for all fitness levels. We'll meet near the Bethesda Fountain and practice on the lawn. This is a wonderful opportunity to connect with nature, meet like-minded individuals, and establish a healthy morning routine.

What to expect:
- 90 minutes of guided yoga practice
- Meditation and breathing exercises
- Community building and social connection
- Beautiful outdoor setting

title: Sunset Hike at Mount Peak
description:
Join us for a breathtaking sunset hike to the summit of Mount Peak! This moderate 5-mile trail offers stunning panoramic views and culminates in a spectacular sunset viewing experience.

Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts who want to combine exercise with natural beauty. We'll maintain a steady pace suitable for intermediate hikers, with breaks at scenic viewpoints. The trail includes some elevation gain but is well-maintained.

Bring your camera - the golden hour light on the mountain peaks is incredible! After the sunset, we'll use headlamps for the descent (we provide loaners if needed).

title: Beginner's Pottery Workshop
description:
Discover the ancient art of pottery in this hands-on beginner's workshop! Learn the fundamentals of working with clay, including hand-building techniques and wheel throwing basics.

No prior experience needed - our skilled instructors will guide you through every step. You'll create 2-3 pieces to take home (fired and glazed). This is a wonderfully meditative and creative experience that combines artistry with tactile satisfaction.

All materials and tools provided. Aprons available but wear clothes you don't mind getting a little messy!

title: Community Basketball Pickup Game
description:
Casual basketball pickup game for all skill levels! Just show up and play. We'll split into teams based on who shows up. Great way to stay active, meet new people, and enjoy some friendly competition.

We play 5v5 full court when we have enough players, otherwise 3v3 half court. Games are to 21, win by 2. Very relaxed atmosphere - we're here to have fun and get some exercise!

title: Mindful Meditation & Breathwork
description:
Find your center in this guided meditation and breathwork session. Perfect for beginners and experienced meditators alike. Learn powerful breathing techniques to reduce stress, increase focus, and cultivate inner peace.

We'll practice several meditation styles including mindfulness meditation, body scan, and loving-kindness meditation. The breathwork portion includes box breathing, alternate nostril breathing, and energizing breath techniques.

title: Weekend Wine Tasting & Social
description:
Join us for an evening of wine tasting and meaningful conversations! Sample 6 carefully selected wines from around the world while connecting with fellow wine enthusiasts and new friends.

Our sommelier will guide you through each tasting, sharing stories about the vineyards and regions. Light appetizers and cheese pairings included. This is a wonderful opportunity to expand your palate and your social circle!

title: Photography Walk: Urban Landscapes
description:
Explore the city through your lens! This photography walk focuses on capturing urban landscapes, architecture, and street photography. All skill levels and camera types welcome (phones included!).

We'll walk through historic neighborhoods, discussing composition, lighting, and storytelling through images. Share tips, get feedback, and discover hidden photographic gems in the city.

title: Cooking Class: Thai Cuisine
description:
Learn to cook authentic Thai dishes in this hands-on cooking workshop! Master the art of balancing sweet, sour, salty, and spicy flavors. We'll prepare Pad Thai, Green Curry, and Mango Sticky Rice.

Our chef instructor will teach you traditional techniques and share stories about Thai food culture. All ingredients provided, and you get to eat what you make! Vegetarian modifications available.
whatToBring: Hair tie if you have long hair

title: Beach Volleyball Tournament
description:
Get ready for sun, sand, and spikes! Our annual beach volleyball tournament is back. Form teams of 4 or join as a free agent - we'll match you up.

Competitive but fun atmosphere. Prizes for top 3 teams. BBQ lunch included. This is a full day of sports, socializing, and summer vibes!

title: Trail Running Group
description:
Join our weekly trail running group for a scenic 5K run through forest trails. All paces welcome - we have beginner, intermediate, and advanced groups.

Meet fellow runners, enjoy nature, and improve your fitness. Coffee meetup afterwards for those who want to socialize. We run rain or shine!

title: Book Club: Contemporary Fiction
description:
Monthly book club discussing contemporary fiction. This month: 'The Midnight Library' by Matt Haig. Join us for thoughtful discussion, tea, and pastries.

All perspectives welcome! We discuss themes, characters, writing style, and personal reflections. Great way to meet fellow book lovers and discover new reads.

title: Sound Bath Healing Session
description:
Immerse yourself in healing vibrations with crystal singing bowls, gongs, and chimes. This meditative sound bath promotes deep relaxation, stress relief, and emotional balance.

Lie down comfortably while our certified practitioner creates waves of soothing sounds. Many describe the experience as deeply restorative and transformative. Perfect for anyone seeking inner peace.

title: Rock Climbing: Indoor Beginner Session
description:
Never climbed before? This is your chance! Learn the basics of indoor rock climbing in a safe, supportive environment. All equipment provided, instruction included.

We'll cover safety, basic techniques, and you'll spend time on beginner-friendly routes. Build strength, confidence, and maybe find a new hobby!

title: Networking Brunch: Creative Professionals
description:
Connect with fellow creative professionals over brunch! Whether you're a designer, writer, artist, photographer, or work in any creative field, this is your community.

Casual atmosphere perfect for making genuine connections, sharing projects, and finding potential collaborators. Includes full brunch menu and mimosas.

title: Kayaking Adventure on the River
description:
Paddle through scenic waterways on this guided kayaking adventure! Perfect for beginners and experienced paddlers alike. We provide all equipment and instruction.

Enjoy wildlife sightings, peaceful waters, and great conversation with fellow adventurers. Finish with a picnic lunch by the riverbank.

title: Painting Workshop: Watercolors
description:
Explore the beautiful medium of watercolor painting! This workshop covers basic techniques including wet-on-wet, dry brush, and layering. Create your own landscape painting to take home.

All materials provided. No experience necessary - just bring your creativity and willingness to experiment!

title: Dance Class: Salsa for Beginners
description:
Learn the passionate rhythms of salsa dancing! This beginner-friendly class teaches basic steps, turns, and partner work. No dance experience or partner needed - we rotate partners throughout.

Great exercise, fun music, and a supportive learning environment. Get ready to move!

title: Mountain Biking Trail Ride
description:
Hit the trails for an exhilarating mountain biking adventure! This intermediate ride covers 12 miles of varied terrain with stunning views. Expect climbs, descents, and technical sections.

Bring your own bike (basic tune-up recommended). Helmets mandatory. We'll maintain a moderate pace with rest stops.

title: Ultimate Frisbee League Game
description:
Join our weekly ultimate frisbee league! Co-ed, all skill levels welcome. We focus on fun, sportsmanship, and getting a great workout.

Teams are randomized each week so you'll meet lots of people. Post-game hangout at nearby pub. Come for the sport, stay for the community!

title: Journaling Workshop: Self-Discovery
description:
Unlock the power of journaling for personal growth and self-discovery. Learn various journaling techniques including gratitude journaling, stream-of-consciousness writing, and prompted reflection.

Beautiful journal included with workshop. Create a sustainable journaling practice that supports your mental wellbeing and life goals.

title: Screenwriting Basics Workshop
description:
Always wanted to write a screenplay? This workshop covers the fundamentals of screenwriting including structure, character development, dialogue, and formatting.

Work on your own script idea with guidance from a professional screenwriter. Share scenes and get feedback. Perfect for aspiring writers!

title: Coffee Cupping Experience
description:
Explore the world of specialty coffee in this guided cupping session! Learn to identify flavor notes, brewing methods, and what makes exceptional coffee.

Taste 6 single-origin coffees from around the world. Perfect for coffee lovers who want to deepen their appreciation. Light pastries included.

title: Sunrise Beach Yoga
description:
Greet the day with yoga on the beach as the sun rises over the ocean. This magical experience combines gentle flow yoga with the healing energy of the sea.

All levels welcome. The sound of waves and fresh ocean air create the perfect setting for mindfulness and movement. Coffee and tea provided after class.

title: Potluck Dinner Party
description:
Join us for a community potluck dinner! Bring a dish to share (homemade or store-bought) and enjoy an evening of good food and great company.

This is a wonderful way to try new foods, share your favorite recipes, and make meaningful connections. Vegetarian, vegan, and dietary restrictions welcomed - just let us know!

title: Woodworking Basics: Build a Cutting Board
description:
Learn essential woodworking skills while creating a beautiful custom cutting board to take home! This hands-on workshop covers safety, tool use, wood selection, and finishing techniques.

No experience needed. All tools and materials provided. You'll leave with a functional piece you made yourself!

title: Poetry Open Mic Night
description:
Share your poems or just come to listen! This supportive open mic celebrates the spoken word in all its forms. Beginners and experienced poets equally welcome.

Each performer gets 5 minutes. Sign up starts at 7pm. Coffee, tea, and cookies provided. Come for the poetry, stay for the community.

title: Fermenting Workshop: Kombucha & Kimchi
description:
Discover the art and science of fermentation! Learn to make your own kombucha and kimchi in this hands-on workshop. Understand the health benefits, flavor profiles, and techniques.

Take home starter cultures and your first batches. Includes recipe booklet with more fermentation ideas.

title: Guided Forest Bathing
description:
Experience the Japanese practice of Shinrin-yoku (forest bathing). This slow, mindful walk through the forest engages all your senses and promotes deep relaxation and connection with nature.

No hiking involved - we'll cover less than a mile over 2 hours. Includes tea ceremony in the forest. Scientifically proven to reduce stress and boost immune function.

title: Storytelling Circle: Personal Narratives
description:
Share your story in a safe, supportive environment. This storytelling circle invites participants to share personal narratives on this month's theme: 'Moments of Courage'.

No judgment, just listening and witness. Stories can be funny, serious, short, or long. This vulnerable practice builds community and empathy.
whatToBring: A story (or just come to listen)

title: Outdoor Bootcamp: Full Body Workout
description:
High-energy outdoor bootcamp combining cardio, strength training, and functional fitness. All fitness levels welcome - exercises can be modified.

Work out in the fresh air with motivating instructors and supportive group energy. Burn calories, build strength, and have fun!
